explanation: The objects involved in completing the task of chilling a cut lettuce slice and a slice of cabbage in the refrigerator and placing them in the sink are: Bowl (to hold the lettuce and cabbage slices), Knife (to slice the cabbage), PepperShaker (possibly for seasoning), Lettuce (to be chilled and sliced), Plate (to place the chilled lettuce slice before placing it in the sink).
